channel.title: CVE Feed for Poppler -- all

item.title: CVE-2012-2142|2024-08-06T19:26:08.483Z -- poppler -- poppler
item.description: The error function in Error.cc in poppler before 0.21.4 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a PDF containing an escape sequence for a terminal emulator.
